original: 益州巴郡人，蜀漢官員。當世有聲名，與張嶷、龔祿友善，劉備入蜀時被徵辟出仕。後又因並存剛柔，以廣文武之用，在人才選任上得到諸葛亮讚賞
text: A native of Bajun, Yizhou, an official of Shuhan. Known in the world, he was friendly to Zhang Yi and Gong Lu, and Liu Bei was expropriated from official positions when he entered Shu. Later, because of the coexistence of rigidity and softness, Zhuge Liang was praised by Zhuge Liang for talent selection
